author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Provide Run1 and Run2 scenarios for dd4hep

#### PR validation:

Use cfg's in Geometry/CMSCommonData/test. The legacy configuration needs some more work (to transfer one of the algorithms for dd4hep)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run2-gex96 Provide Run1 and Run2 scenarios for dd4hep
